settings.overlay_text: Shop the Navy Shimmer Collection 5 days early. Only available at The Grove and on the Shop App.

settings.text: Monday mamas know that when it comes to support — alright just doesn’t cut it. Our maternity lines are designed for and by moms-to-be.

settings.title: Our Partners
settings.text_1: Monday Swimwear makes suits that are oh-so-comfortable and ultra soft. What’s more, they’re designed to last.

settings.subtitle: JUNE 8 - JUNE 19
settings.title: Free Vacation
settings.text:
The Golden Vacation Giveaway

One extremely lucky winner and their friend will win a 5 night stay in Bali in their own private villa provided by The Luxe Nomad.

From June 8 - June 19, all purchases at The Monday Beach Club Pop-Up are eligible for entry. Entry is also possible at the link below.
